name: Skylights
description:
RTS where you communicate with your units by shining coloured lights at them! Defeat as many red monsters as you can.

  • Blue: Do nothing
  •  Yellow: Run away 
  • Green: Build battlestations 
  • Red: Use battlestations 
  • Arrow keys: Fly your ship
  • Mouse: Look around

You can play with an Xbox controller instead. Left joystick to fly your ship, right joystick to look around, and A, B, X and Y buttons to shine lights.

If you have difficulty seeing the colours in this game, you can edit the "colour settings.json" file as you like.
